name: Prevent The Fall
description: Prevent the Fall is a Role Playing Game/Dungeon Crawler. Advance through 20 character levels, as you acquire items of power, and attempt to conquer dungeons which are a mixture of hand-crafted and generated content. Both VR and non-VR and single player or multiplayer coop are supported.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: 64-Bit OS Required, Windows 7 SP1, 8, 10 Processor: Dual Core Processor Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 730 or AMD Radeon R7 240 or better DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 10 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: 64-Bit OS Required, Windows 7 SP1, 8, 10 Processor: Quad Core Processor - Intel i5 or AMD Ryzen r5 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 or AMD Radeon R9 290 or better DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 10 GB available space Additional Notes: Optional Steam VR Compatible or Oculus Headset
